#summary !PreferredVolume Binary Data Field

= !PreferredVolume Binary Data Field =


A [T_MP4_Fixed_2 fixed-point 8.8 number] that specifies how loud to play this movie’s sound. A value of 1.0 indicates full volume.

*Serialization Namespace:*  [Bin_N_MP4 MP4]<br>*Assembly:*  MP4 (in MP4.dll)
== Data Serialization ==

=== Field Value ===
Type: *UInt16* — a 16-bit (2 bytes) unsigned integer <br>
